content: would it make sense to extend #[target_feature(enable = "...")] to work at the module level? (or even at the crate level)
I think it can already happen at the crate level, though we should have better integration for doing so via something other than rustflags.
I like the idea of supporting it at the module level, since that would work well for modules with various optimization levels.
That also gets me wondering about things like #[target_feature(...)] #[path="themod.rs"] mod themod_opt_featurename;
